item.title: WireGuard VPS as Reverse Proxy and Gateway to Home Network
item.description: Navigate around Carrier-Grade NAT (CGNAT) limitations by securely exposing your homelab services with a reverse proxy. Additionally, access your home network from anywhere using WireGuard. This setup requires only an affordable VPS hosting a public IP, coupled with a WireGuard connection established within your home network.
